code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UpdateThemeImage=()=>{const[id,setId]=useState('');const[image,setImage]=useState(null);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[imageUrl,setImageUrl]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!id||!image){setMessage('❌ Please provide both ID and image.');return;}const formData=new FormData();formData.append('image',image);try{const res=await fetch(`https://api.malidag.com/themes/${id}/image`,{method:'PUT',body:formData});const data=await res.json();if(res.ok){setMessage('✅ Image updated successfully!');setImageUrl(data.theme.image);}else{setMessage(`❌ Error: ${data.message}`);}}catch(err){setMessage(`❌ Error: ${err.message}`);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'40px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Update Theme Image by ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Theme ID:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:id,onChange:e=>setId(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["New Image:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:e=>setImage(e.target.files[0]),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Update Image"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),imageUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:"Updated Theme",style:{width:'300px',marginTop:'20px'}})]});};export default UpdateThemeImage;
